name: Thrust (itch) (Ismael Bueno)
description:
Shoot and fly your ship against an infinite swarm of incoming enemies! Earn points to upgrade and buy new ships in three different scenarios with increasing difficulty. Reach the highest tier ships to attempt to destroy the spawners as an ultimate challenge.

  • 3 scenarios with different enemy ships of increasing difficulty. The snow, plains and crystal biomes offer a wide variety of enemies and spawner ships, each one harder than the last
  • Upgrade and buy new ships at the workshop. The ship workshop allows you to progress in the game by upgrading your ship's attributes (speed, hull, damage etc) or by buying new and more capable ships
  • Fight waves of endless enemies. The spawner ship will relentlessly eject more and more enemies for you to combat as long as it is alive 
  • Defeat the overpowered spawner ships. Incredibly tough and powerful, but not invincible. Win the match by destroying them with your upgraded high tier ship
